sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-checkout', templateUrl: './checkout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./checkout.component.css'], }) export class CheckoutComponent { checkoutForm = new FormGroup({ firstName: new FormControl('', Validators.required), lastName: new FormControl('', Validators.required), email: new FormControl('', Validators.required), country: new FormControl('', Validators.required), address: new FormControl('', Validators.required), zipCode: new FormControl('', Validators.required), state: new FormControl('', Validators.required), }); }

Please enter your personal details.
